fix(curriculum): modify question in html validation lecture (#57624)

files.patch:
@@ -86,36 +86,36 @@ A tool that checks the validity of HTML.
 
 ## --text--
 
-Which of these is not an example of an HTML validator?
+Which of these is an example of an HTML validator?
 
 ## --answers--
 
-W3.org HTML validator.
+W3.org HTML validator
 
-### --feedback--
+---
 
-Look out for the option that is not an HTML validator.
+CSS Lint
 
----
+### --feedback--
 
-JS World HTML Validator.
+Look for the tool specifically designed to check the validity of HTML code.
 
 ---
 
-Prettier Code Formatter.
+JavaScript Debugger
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-Look out for the option that is not an HTML validator.
+Look for the tool specifically designed to check the validity of HTML code.
 
 ---
 
-JSONFormatter.org HTML Validator.
+Photoshop
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-Look out for the option that is not an HTML validator.
+Look for the tool specifically designed to check the validity of HTML code.
 
 ## --video-solution--
 
-2
+1
